title: The World Cup story
itunes:title: The World Cup story
itunes:subtitle: With this year’s tournament in Russia only a few months away, we speak to veteran football writer Brian Glanville about the 88-year history of this global sporting extravaganza
description:
With this year’s tournament in Russia only a few months away, we speak to veteran football writer Brian Glanville about the 88-year history of this global sporting extravaganza

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
